definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The batch production is expensive and low output.
sentences.chinese: 同时间歇式生产产量低，相对生产成本较高。

sentences.english: Additionally, the yield from the plant is low, leading to high production costs.
sentences.chinese: 此外，这种植物的产量很低，导致了生产成本高。

sentences.english: The production cost of them is only one thousandth of that of the imported diamond cutters.
sentences.chinese: 它们的生产成本只是进口钻石刀具的千分之一。

sentences.english: You couldn't hold the cost of production down.
The inflation has kited production costs.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀使生产成本迅速上升。

sentences.english: Broiler farmers have lower input costs via government support.
sentences.chinese: 在政府的支持下养鸡户生产成本较低。

sentences.english: The paper analyzed product capitalized cost of expanding blood meals.
sentences.chinese: 本文进行了膨化血粉生产成本的分析。

sentences.english: It has obvious synergized action, and can obviously raise effect for preventing disease, and can greatly lower production cost and reducing its price.
sentences.chinese: 可以显著提高防病效果及大幅度降低生产成本和价格。

sentences.english: Such attenuated live vaccines can be more effective, but are costlier to produce.
sentences.chinese: 这种减毒活疫苗更有效但生产成本也很昂贵。

sentences.english: The use of grinding aids can increase cement production, reduce productive cost, and improve cement performance.
sentences.chinese: 使用助磨剂能增加水泥产量，降低水泥生产成本。

sentences.english: Things exchange for each other according to their cost of production.
sentences.chinese: 根据各自的生产成本进行物物交换。

sentences.english: Their cost is only one thousandth of imported diamond tool.
sentences.chinese: 它们的生产成本只是进口钻石刀具的千分之一。

sentences.english: I say we retail at 60 and produce at 14.
sentences.chinese: 我的看法是零售价60，生产成本14。

sentences.english: The talcum powder took the volume auxiliaries , reduced the sealant production cost.
sentences.chinese: 滑石粉作为体积填充剂，降低了密封胶的生产成本。

sentences.english: Their cost of production is only  one one-thousandth of the total cost of diamond tools importation.
sentences.chinese: 它们的生产成本只是进口钻石刀具的千分之一。

sentences.english: Also, the output, price, cost etc. concerning LVL production are presented.
sentences.chinese: LVL在全世界的生产量，销售价格和生产成本。

definition: magnitude of value/labor value (in economics, the labor inherent in a commodity)
